dict.string: OR( ANY attachments.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.text", ANY attachments.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.image", ANY attachments.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.url", ANY attachments.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.movie", ANY attachments.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.audio" )
